fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Culture and media, Competition, Consumers, Energy, Environment, Taxation, Single market, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Digital economy and society, Transport, Climate Action, Communication
eu_initiatives: ICT, Technology, Digital, TMT, Audio-visual and Media Regulation, Information Society, Environmental Affairs, Renewable Energy, Agriculture and Rural Development, Internal Market.
goals__remit: Explico is an independent, public affairs consultancy boutique based in CEE, specialised for TMT and energy industries. We provide easy and effective solutions to policy matters for our clients in the wider digital and energy industry, by helping them to find the right messages and effective communication towards public stakeholders. We are based in Hungary, however our business covers the CEE region.
customers: BAT Pécs Tobacco Factory Limited Liability Company# Hunarian Bioetanol Association and its members, Pannonia Ethanol Private Limited Company and Hungrana Limited Liability Company
